pr_title: Move SegmentMetadata from pinot-common to pinot-core

timeline.message:
Move SegmentMetadata from pinot-common to pinot-core

This PR only moves the class into another package, no actual code change

timeline.author: mcvsubbu
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -28,6 +29,7 @@ /** * The SegmentMetadata class holds the segment level management information and data statistics. */ +@InterfaceAudience.Private
